sentences.english: ObjectiveTo sum up the experiences of arc incision treating gluteus contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结弧形小切口治疗臀肌挛缩症的治疗体会。

sentences.english: Keep your shoulders down, and contract your gluteal muscles to push your hips up in the air.
sentences.chinese: 肩部向下，臀肌收缩，将臀部抬起悬于空中。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the surgical method for treatment of gluteal muscular contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨臀肌挛缩症的手术方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the biomechanical mechanism of clinical representation of gluteal muscle contracture (GMC).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨臀肌挛缩症患者临床表现的生物力学机制。

sentences.english: Results This is a disorder of contracture of gluteal muscles.
sentences.chinese: 结果臀肌挛缩症与肌肉注射关系十分密切。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a better surgical mode to tr eat gluteal muscle contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨一种更适合于治疗臀肌挛缩症的手术方式。

sentences.english: To analyze the reasons for the secondary operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析臀肌挛缩症二次手术产生的原因。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of children's gluteal muscle contracture (GMC) on skeleton development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童臀肌挛缩对骨骼生长发育的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the pathogenesis of gluteus muscle contracture(GMC)and evaluate the effectiveness of the small incision surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨臀肌挛缩症的发病原因及小切口手术疗效。

definition: serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)
rectus abdominis muscle (aka abdominals or abs)
triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
trapezius muscle (of the upper back and neck)
pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
